title: Choose the Ideal Plan
description: Select the plan that best fits your needs and start enjoying all the features of our platform.
price_note: The plan may have price changes related to the taxes of your country.

empty.title: No plans available
empty.description: Plans are being prepared. Come back soon!

change_modal.title: Confirm plan change
change_modal.description: You are changing from plan {{current_plan}} to {{new_plan}}. This action cannot be undone.
change_modal.low_price: Since the new plan is cheaper than the current one, it will only be applied after the current cycle ends on {{end_date}}.
change_modal.high_price: Since the new plan is more expensive than the current one, a proportional charge will be made on your card for the remaining value until the end of the current subscription cycle.

no_permission.title: You do not have permission to manage this company's plans
no_permission.description: Log out or change your profile to view plans

change_to_admin_description: Change to administrator to access this page

new.title: Register Plan
new.description: Fill in the data below to register a new plan

edit.title: Edit Plan
edit.description: Edit the plan data by filling in the fields below

cancel.title: Exit
cancel.description: Are you sure you want to exit? You have unsaved changes, they will be lost upon confirmation

infos.company: Associate the plan with a company
